snippet: The death of the title character in Massenet’s “Werther” was silent for opera fans who went to movie theaters across the country on Saturday to see Jonas Kaufmann perform the title role in the Metropolitan Opera’s live high-definition...
abstract: The death of the title character in Massenet’s “Werther” was silent for opera fans who went to movie theaters across the country on Saturday to see Jonas Kaufmann perform the title role in the Metropolitan Opera’s live high-definition simulcast.

headline.main: Technical Problem Silences Ending of Met's Live Simulcast of 'Werther'
headline.print_headline: ‘Werther’ Goes Silent a Little Too Soon
